channel.title: My Hero Academia: Izuku Midoriya
channel.description:
![20171105015546_1|690x388](upload://yl3p6nHl2BuCk8k7eBWdzaMqqBw.jpg)
My Hero Academia's Izuku Midoriya. Sadly I died Day 2 off a "random hang" so nobody was able to see it :(
***Disclaimer** _This was obviously not hand drawn, i'td take anybody >10 nights to draw something like this. **I coded a program to draw deathnotes for me, and NO I will not be making it public, for deathnote ToS reasons.** The program provides no harm to the game, if used responsibly, and i'd like to keep it that way. I hope you can understand :)_

item.title: My Hero Academia: Izuku Midoriya
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
But if you didn’t draw it then it’s not a deathnote???
